Alexander Wilson


This site was last updated on July 7, 2024. It was created using Jekyll with interactive components running on p5.js.

Magical Mathematics

In the Winter term of 2023 I mentored Sofia Goncalves in the Dartmouth directed reading program. We read out of the book Magical Mathematics by Diaconis and Graham, and Sofia used the concept of universal cycles to come up with her own magic trick involving set partitions. (click here to see her poster)
